articles.title: Tech Down as Rotation Out of AI Continues -- Tech Roundup
articles.description:
Shares of technology companies fell as a rotation out of artificial-intelligence companies continued.
Nvidia, Palantir Technologies and Oracle -- three bellwethers of AI sentiment -- all fell by...
articles.content:
Shares of technology companies fell as a rotation out of artificial-intelligence companies continued.
Nvidia, Palantir Technologies and Oracle -- three bellwethers of AI sentiment -- all fell by more than 2%.

articles.title: Pune public policy festival to begin today
articles.description: The opening day features discussions on science and technology policy, the role of technology in strengthening mental health systems, and the changing landscape of higher education
articles.content: Spanning January 9 and 10, the festival, themed “Decoding Technology and Society,” will delve into pressing topics such as artificial intelligence governance, financial innovation, cultural intellectual property, mental health in the AI era, and the ... [1313 chars]

articles.title: Exclusive: Wingtech Chair Vows to Regain Control of Nexperia After 100
articles.description: Exclusive: Wingtech Chair Vows to Regain Control of Nexperia After 100-Day Standoff - In an interview with Caixin, Ruby Yang Mu recounts how the dispute unfolded and addresses concerns surrounding the Dutch chipmaker, including supply disruptions and alleged technology transfer
articles.content: More than 100 days after Dutch authorities froze Wingtech Technology Co. Ltd.’s core overseas asset, the fate of its Dutch subsidiary, Nexperia Holding BV, remains unresolved, turning what was once a commercial acquisition into a test case in the wid... [589 chars]

articles.title: How the use of AI chatbots for online shopping could benefit Shopify’s growth plans
articles.description: Technology allows shoppers to find and buy products through platforms such as OpenAI’s ChatGPT
articles.content:
Shopify Inc. SHOP-T is poised to see a wave of growth from agentic artificial intelligence, a new trend in e-commerce that has the potential to reshape the retail industry, analysts say.

articles.title: Qualcomm to provide infotainment tech for new Volkswagen platform
articles.description: BERLIN, Jan ‌8 (Reuters) - Volkswagen plans a long-term supply ‌deal with U.S. chip designer Qualcomm ‌to deliver infotainment technology for the German carmaker's new software platform.
articles.content:
BERLIN, Jan ‌8 (Reuters) - Volkswagen plans a long-term supply ‌deal with U.S. chip designer Qualcomm ‌to deliver infotainment technology for the German carmaker's new software platform.
Qualcomm will provide high-performance ‍system-on-chips for inf... [803 chars]

articles.title: IIIM BioNEST hosts ‘Innovative X 1.0’ Prog under Mission YUVA
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent KATHUA, Jan 8: The BioNEST Bioincubation Centre of CSIR-Indian Institute of Integrative Medicine (CSIR-IIIM), in collaboration with IIIM’s Technology Business Incubator (IIIM-TBI) organised the “Innovative X 1.0 – Awareness Campaign” under the Mission YUVA initiative, here today. Scores of students from local colleges, farmers and aspiring entrepreneurs from across the region participated in the programme, reflecting the growing interest in biotechnology-driven enterprises in J&K. The event was inaugurated by the chief guest, Shahzad Alam, Managing Director, Mission YUVA […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
KATHUA, Jan 8: The BioNEST Bioincubation Centre of CSIR-Indian Institute of Integrative Medicine (CSIR-IIIM), in collaboration with IIIM’s Technology Business Incubator (IIIM-TBI) organised the “Innovative X 1.0 – Awareness Ca... [2214 chars]
